org.mozilla.browser.impl
Class PromptService

java.lang.Object
  org.mozilla.browser.impl.PromptService
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.mozilla.interfaces.nsIPromptService, org.mozilla.interfaces.nsISupports
public class PromptService
extends Object
implements org.mozilla.interfaces.nsIPromptService

Re-implementation of a mozilla service for handling displaying of various message dialogs in the swing way. http://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/nsIPromptService http://www.xulplanet.com/references/xpcomref/ifaces/nsIPromptService.html
